New Records: Elly De La Cruz hit his 25th home run and recorded four RBIs in the game
Key Match Events: De La Cruz hit a slider for a 6-0 lead in the fourth inning
De La Cruz knocked a two-out single in the sixth inning for another RBI
Pre-Game Insights: The Reds had a 76-80 record and won five of their past eight games
Rhett Lowder held Pittsburgh scoreless through five innings
Post-Match Reflections: The Reds won the series and took a 7-1 victory
The Pirates had limited baserunners through the first four innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Billy Cook hit a leadoff home run for the Pirates
The Pirates had five baserunners through the first four innings
